Each year the project visits a rapidly developing country. The destination of 2022 will be South Korea. As the FSA operates on a non-profit basis, company specific research can be conducted at a competitive price. The quality is guaranteed by years of experience, the careful selection of researchers, seminars and courses from knowledgeable experts, and guidance by leading consultancy firms and the best professors of Amsterdam.
